heading: cha-ching!
subheading: continuing to ride a buoyant economy, americans are expected to keep up their robust spending all the way through the holiday season and into next year, economists say. encouraged by a strong job market, rising wages, and a healthy stock market, they apparently see no reason to stop, analysts say. consumer spending in november and december is expected to climb about 6.5 percent from last year. to paraphrase the old master sergeant: "spend it if you got it."
author: wired staff
text: continuing to ride a buoyant economy, americans are expected to keep up their robust spending all the way through the holiday season and into next year, economists say. encouraged by a strong job market, rising wages, and a healthy stock market, they apparently see no reason to stop, analysts say. consumer spending in november and december is expected to climb about 6.5 percent from last year. to paraphrase the old master sergeant: "spend it if you got it."
